dct_description_sm: California as an island with flat northern coast, with place names: C. Mendocino, C.d. Pinas, C.d. Galera, I.S. Augustin, C dt. Engan-nd. Unlabelled suggestion of strait to far north.
Title cartouche with natives and Europeans (bottom center).
Scale given in Milliaria Germanica (bottom right).
Possibly issued in: Philippi Cluveri introductionis in universam geographiam ... / published by Janssonius van Waesbergen, Amsterdam, 1676.
